<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Initial discrepancy = &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; discrepancy(ProbMatrix, Freq).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba83a013c55b19255697393a10d9165e">toString</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Successors&#91;I&#93; holds unique sucessors of the I-th block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Successors = std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;size&#95;t&gt;&gt;(Freq.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Freq.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Successors&#91;Jump.first&#93;.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To speedup computation, we maintain a set of &quot;active&quot; blocks whose</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frequencies need to be updated based on the incoming edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The set is dynamic and changes after every update. Initially all blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a positive frequency are active</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsActive = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>(Freq.size(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::queue&lt;size&#95;t&gt; ActiveSet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Freq.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ActiveSet.push(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over the blocks propagating frequencies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It++ &lt; MaxIterations &amp;&amp; !ActiveSet.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ActiveSet.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ActiveSet.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a new frequency for the block: NewFreq := Freq \\times ProbMatrix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A special care is taken for self-edges that needs to be scaled by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (1.0 - SelfProb), where SelfProb is the sum of probabilities on the edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> NewFreq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> OneMinusSelfProb = Scaled64::getOne();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.first == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">        OneMinusSelfProb -= Jump.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewFreq += Freq&#91;Jump.first&#93; &#42; Jump.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OneMinusSelfProb != Scaled64::getOne())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewFreq /= OneMinusSelfProb;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block&#39;s frequency has changed enough, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make sure the block and its successors are in the active set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Change = Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt;= NewFreq ? Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; - NewFreq : NewFreq - Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Change &gt; Precision) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ActiveSet.push(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsActive&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Succ : Successors&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsActive&#91;Succ&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ActiveSet.push(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">          IsActive&#91;Succ&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the frequency for the block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = NewFreq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Completed &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; It &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; inference iterations&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (%0.0f per block)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(It) / Freq.size())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Final   discrepancy = &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; discrepancy(ProbMatrix, Freq).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba83a013c55b19255697393a10d9165e">toString</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::findReachableBlocks(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt; &amp;Blocks)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find all blocks to apply inference on, that is, reachable from the entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// along edges with non-zero probablities</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::queue&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BlockT &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Reachable;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a> = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Entry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Reachable.insert(Entry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT &#42;SrcBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT &#42;DstBB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc2e6a2001a5f102f18060a53520e82b">children&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(SrcBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EP = BPI-&gt;getEdgeProbability(SrcBB, DstBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EP.isZero())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Reachable.insert(DstBB).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(DstBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find all blocks to apply inference on, that is, backward reachable from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the entry along (backward) edges with non-zero probablities</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BlockT &#42;, 8&gt;</a> InverseReachable;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT &amp;BB : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An exit block is a block without any successors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasSucc = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc2e6a2001a5f102f18060a53520e82b">llvm::children&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(&amp;BB).empty();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasSucc &amp;&amp; Reachable.count(&amp;BB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(&amp;BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InverseReachable.insert(&amp;BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EP = BPI-&gt;getEdgeProbability(BB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = BlockIndex.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>)-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!SumProb&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lint-cpp/#a45005634b54e2126cb3e6ec0dbc9ade4">isZero</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Zero sum probability of non-exit block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Jump : Succs&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Prob = Jump.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Src, Prob / SumProb&#91;Src&#93;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add transitions from sinks to the source</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a5514a17c0ec3ccae841930a4f8f74f99">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase::Scaled64</a> BlockFrequencyInfoImpl&lt;BT&gt;::discrepancy(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProbMatrixType &amp;ProbMatrix, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;Scaled64&gt; &amp;Freq)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Freq&#91;0&#93; &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Incorrectly computed frequency of the entry block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Discrepancy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; ProbMatrix.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a63e268d5bde0e2db15be919d727b7cf2">Scaled64</a> Sum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Jump : ProbMatrix&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sum += Freq&#91;Jump.first&#93; &#42; Jump.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Discrepancy += Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &gt;= Sum ? Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; - Sum : Sum - Freq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Normalizing by the frequency of the entry block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Discrepancy / Freq&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"></CodeLine>
